body_html:
The same here on
GCC: 7.1.1
glibc: 2.25
bazel: 0.5.3
OS: Fedora 26

The problem seems to be solved by adding --copt=-O to the bazel build.
cf. https://stackoverflow.com/a/40374431/6555620

body:
The same here on 
GCC: 7.1.1
glibc: 2.25
bazel: 0.5.3
OS: Fedora 26

The problem seems to be solved by adding `--copt=-O` to the bazel build.
cf. [https://stackoverflow.com/a/40374431/6555620](https://stackoverflow.com/a/40374431/6555620)
